languages.text: "Ну назначал я на смены за взятки, и что? Разве за такое мундира лишают?"

traits.locale_text: "Ну назначал я на смены за взятки, и что? Разве за такое мундира лишают?"

languages.text: "I assigned shifts in exchange for bribes, so what? They take away your uniform for that?"
languages.original_text: "Ну назначал я на смены за взятки, и что? Разве за такое мундира лишают?"

traits.locale_text: "I assigned shifts in exchange for bribes, so what? They take away your uniform for that?"
"I assigned shifts in exchange for bribes, so what? They take away your uniform for that?"
"I assigned shifts in exchange for bribes, so what? They take away your uniform for that?"
"I assigned shifts in exchange for bribes, so what? They take away your uniform for that?"
"I assigned shifts in exchange for bribes, so what? They take away your uniform for that?"

languages.text: «¿Y qué si acepté sobornos a la hora de asignar los turnos de guardia? ¿Por eso me van a despojar de mi uniforme?».
languages.original_text: "I assigned shifts in exchange for bribes, so what? They take away your uniform for that?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Y qué si acepté sobornos a la hora de asignar los turnos de guardia? ¿Por eso me van a despojar de mi uniforme?».

languages.text: 「賄賂と引き換えにシフトを割り当てた。だから何だって言うんだ？そのために制服を取り上げるのか？」
languages.original_text: "I assigned shifts in exchange for bribes, so what? They take away your uniform for that?"

traits.locale_text: 「賄賂と引き換えにシフトを割り当てた。だから何だって言うんだ？そのために制服を取り上げるのか？」

languages.text: “我分配班次的时候确实收了好处，可这至于吗？他们就因为这个，就把我的制服给扒了？”
languages.original_text: "I assigned shifts in exchange for bribes, so what? They take away your uniform for that?"

traits.locale_text: “我分配班次的时候确实收了好处，可这至于吗？他们就因为这个，就把我的制服给扒了？”

languages.text: "Ich habe Schichten für Geld vergeben, und? Verliert man dafür seine Uniform?"
languages.original_text: "I assigned shifts in exchange for bribes, so what? They take away your uniform for that?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe Schichten für Geld vergeben, und? Verliert man dafür seine Uniform?"

languages.text: « J'ai attribué les différents tours de garde en échange de pots-de-vin, et alors ? Depuis quand on vous prend votre uniforme pour si peu ? »
languages.original_text: "I assigned shifts in exchange for bribes, so what? They take away your uniform for that?"

traits.locale_text: « J'ai attribué les différents tours de garde en échange de pots-de-vin, et alors ? Depuis quand on vous prend votre uniforme pour si peu ? »

languages.text: "Vardiyaları rüşvetle ayarladıysam ne olmuş? Bunun için üniformadan mı oluyoruz artık?"
languages.original_text: "I assigned shifts in exchange for bribes, so what? They take away your uniform for that?"
